synopsis.text:
Moon-Zhanying Feixian, an ancient legend, is about to resurface in the martial arts realm of Jiuyou. Once a prodigy swordsman, Shen Zhenyi, the third son of Abandoned Sword Villa, was destined for greatness until a cruel twist of fate left him crippled. However, Shen Zhenyi's story is far from over as he becomes the master of the ancient martial arts technique, the Wan Zang Sword Sutra. This newfound power draws the attention of the Demon Sect's leader, Minyiren, who engages in a fierce battle with Shen Zhenyi to claim the Sword Sutra. Amidst the chaos, Shen Zhenyi vanishes.

A year later, the Abandoned Sword Villa reopens, and Shen Zhenyi emerges, seeking a disciple to impart the knowledge of the Wan Zang Sword Sutra. This unexpected move sends shockwaves throughout the martial arts world. Enter Chu Huoluo, a female disciple from Lieyang Mansion, who stumbles upon the opportunity to become Shen Zhenyi's apprentice. Together, master and apprentice embark on a journey to unravel a hidden mystery.

As they delve deeper into the enigma, a crisis looms in the shadows, and the final conspiracy unveiled points to the ancient legend of Moon-Zhanying Feixian. Will Shen Zhenyi and Chu Huoluo rise to the challenge and overcome the impending threat, or will they succumb to the power that seeks to control the Wan Zang Sword Sutra? Only time will tell, as the legend of Shen Zhenyi continues to unfold.
